# we-dropdown-group



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description | Type     | Default    |
| ------------- | ------------- | ----------- | -------- | ---------- |
| `orientation` | `orientation` |             | `string` | `"column"` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                               | Description                                                                                                         |
| ---------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--dropdown-group--background`     | Background of of dropdown group <br> Default: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1)                                                |
| `--dropdown-group--border`         | Border of dropdown group <br> Default: solid 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)                                                   |
| `--dropdown-group--display`        | Display property of dropdown group <br> Default: flex                                                               |
| `--dropdown-group--flex-direction` | Flex direction of dropdown group, the default value depend of the class choosen, column or row <br> Default: column |
| `--dropdown-group--height`         | Height of dropdown group <br> Default: auto                                                                         |
| `--dropdown-group--width`          | Width of dropdown group <br> Default: fit-content                                                                   |


----------------------------------------------
